roleset.name: use an endoscope to look inside the body

role.descr: more specific entity scoped, if in addition to ARG1

example.text: A colonoscopy and upper endoscopy were essentially negative...
example.amr: (n / negative-01 :ARG3 (a / and :op1 (c / colonoscopy-01) :op2 (e / endoscopy-01 :ARG2 (a2 / anatomical-site :name (n2 / name :op1 "upper")))) :mod (e2 / essential))
